### Example 1: Update a continuous export configuration in an application insights resource (autogenerated)
```powershell
PS C:\> Set-AzApplicationInsightsContinuousExport -DocumentType Request -ExportId jlTFEiBg1rkDXOCIeJQ2mB2TxZg= -Name test -ResourceGroupName testgroup -StorageAccountId /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/testgroup/providers/Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/teststorageaccount -StorageLocation sourcecentralus -StorageSASUri $sasuri
```
